name: European Mystery: Scent of Desire Collector’s Edition
description: Several young women have gone missing in Paris. Now only you can stop a maniac’s murderous trail of fragrance and deception!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1130 MB available space
